pr_title: Web console: switch to switches instead of checkboxes

timeline.bodyText: If none of the menu items are checked, there's no visual clue that the menu item has a checkbox since it's blank. Maybe something like the TICK CIRCLE / CIRCLE icons could be used instead? Or, if this was changed to use the Switch component (like the other changes you made in the PR), would it have similar styling issues?
